definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: Look at my sun plant, you also can call them "can't be dead".
sentences.chinese: 看看我的太阳花，你也可以叫他们死不了。

sentences.english: I wear lots of bug repellant so I don't die.
sentences.chinese: 我带着许多驱虫剂所以我死不了。

sentences.english: People don't die with a fever of one hundred and two.
sentences.chinese: 发烧到一百零二度可死不了。

sentences.english: Too old to live, too young to die.
sentences.chinese: 日子太快没发过，年纪太轻死不了。
这些家伙还真死不了，师父，你没事吧？

sentences.english: Along the way, we’ll drink from an oasis and we’ll survive.
sentences.chinese: 在沿途，我们从绿洲取点水，这样我们就死不了。

sentences.english: Bill Clinton won't be dead until he's laid out with his sax.
sentences.chinese: 在克林顿萨克斯风吹到昏倒以前，他还死不了。

sentences.english: "hard work never killed anybody. " but why take the risk? "
sentences.chinese: 刻苦工作死不了人。但是为什么要冒那个险呢？

definition: better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5

definition: to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
to say definitely/to commit (to a proposition)
once the main problem is solved, all troubles are solved/death ends all one's troubles
to end one's suffering by dying quickly and being reincarnated/(fig.) to get it over with
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
one is bound for good fortune after surviving a great disaster (proverb)
pinyin: da4 nan4 bu4 si3 , bi4 you3 hou4 fu2

definition: unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
